author: Mary Wille

review: We canceled our unused cable subscription and bought the Google Chromecast for one TV and the Amazon Fire Stick for the other. We love them both.  We are Prime members so the Fire Stick offers access to those shows.  But we can cast the shows to any TV with the Chromecast.  We have Netflix and Hulu.  Installation was very easy.  The wifi picks up on any TV in the house.  This is a great piece of equipment to have for vacation homes also for such an affordable price.  Highly recommend!
author: AG'sMom

review: Second one purchased (one for living room and one for bedroom).  Cheap enough price, works well.  Some reviews have stated it can eat up wifi bandwidth, but no problems so far.
author: Hailey

review: The product description did not say that a "power cord" was included with the item. When I ordered the Chromecast I also ordered a "small" power cord. When the package arrive, it had the power cord with it. Still learning how to work it. It works great for pandora but if you have Amazon Prime you can not "cast" the movie and such. So overall this is a good product, just other companies need to get on board with support for it...
